item.title: Start your own client v4
item.dc:creator: @renegadejoe renegadejoe
item.description:
@renegadejoe wrote:

Dude, I am speechless absolutely speechless. This is BY FAR the BEST tutorial I have ever found on moparscape. ++++++rep if I could :(.

BTW, everyone your right the links don’t work but theres a easy way to make them work heres how.

For example if your using ENDAR this is original link,
http://%22http//www.megaupload.com/?d=44JPTEAY"

Just change it so it looks like this
http://www.megaupload.com/?d=44JPTEAY

it will work :D.

kyle you own :D.
